name: Bettle vs Fox
description:
Platformer game with Fox as the main character and some battles as the enemy.

How to play:

  • WASD to move or climb.
  • Space to jump.
  • Don't touch the battles and water.
  • You can only jump on the ground, (CANNOT JUMP WHILE COLLIDING WITH LADDER).
  • Collect as many coins as possible, the score will be determined by how many coins collected.
